maha makarun mardanaya kalada kuda makarun bahara kirima swayanshodhitha kriyawak bawa pahadili karayi.me kalayedi makarunge bowima athi bahulaya.deshapalanika-samajayiya-aarthika-adhyapanika-sanskruthika yana wiwidha stharawala makara balapam dakiya hakiya.thamange pawathma thahawuru kara ganima sandaha wyaptha kala makara jana wala balapam kiri piti bonu labana kuda daruwakuge kiri joguwa menma wishrama giya wagakiwa yuthu pudgalayange jiwana thorathuru mangin da idiripath karanu atha.

dara ganime hakiyawa thibenawa.shri lanka kandayamaee nisa shri lanka wolibol sammelanaye pradhanathama balaporoththuwa bich wolibol kridawa diyunu kirimayi.danata migamuwa, kaluthara werala haraha rata watema aarugambe werala dakwa bich wolibol prachalitha karanawa.me wasare hambanthota dakuna werale pawathwena werala krida ulelata pirimi kantha bich wolibol kandayam kipayakma idiripath karanawa.me sandaha kridaka kridikawan thora ganima sandaha rata wata muhudu werala aashi්rathawa bich wolibol tharagawali pawathwanawa.

karyalayen parana paththara thoga ganan kunugodata watenu ada dakinawita ekala parana paththara raththalak soyaganimata darana lada wehesa nithathinma sihiyata eyi.mita amatharawa gedarin thambapu wi goniya karathiyagena wi molata gos kotagena enawita julis mudalalige kadeta samba hal seruwak rupiyal 1.50 bagin wikkemi.mema wanchawa wadikal karagena yannata nohakiwuye ammata iwa watuna nisaya.melesa amaruwen asiruwen upaya sapaya gath mudal siyallama wiyadam wuye kadachoru kamatath chithrapata narambaimatathya.ekala api dum panaya ho mathpan panaya nokalemu.galariye chithrapatayak narambaimata wiyadam wuye shatha panaspahaki.deweni panthiya rupiyal ekayi shatha dahayak wu athara palaweni panthiye narambaima sandaha ru.

hambanthota magampura jathyanthara waraya eeye udasana yedunu subha mohothin athigaru janapathidunge surathin janatha ayithiyata path una.ee sadaha sahabhagi wu dahas gananak janathawa athare sitimin ee thejanwitha mohothe asiriya wida ganime awasthawa matath labuna.magampura waraya bhumiye eeye dinayedi mage jangama durakathanaye satahan wu sith aadi dasun kihipayak pahathin dakwenawa.emenma athi mahathwu janatha manapayen dewana dhura kalaya sadaha diwurum dun janapathiduni obata ...	19

,awathni‚ yamak bhagyawathun wahanse thopata kotin deshana kota wisathara washayen arthaya nobedra un aasanayen nagita wiharayata wadiyahuda ,mahana yamak hethukota gena thrushna drushtiyayi kiyana lada pramadayata hethuwu bawin prapanyacha nami dharmayo purushaya kerehi pawathithda‚ ee hethun wana drelos aayathanayan kerehi indin sathutu wiyayuththak naththeda‚ mamaya mageyayi kiwa yuththak naththeda‚ galiya yuththak naththeda‚ eyama raganusayayange kelawara wanneya‚ eyama patighanusayayange kelawarawanneya‚ eyama ditatanusayayange kelawara wanneya‚ eyama wichikijanusayayange kelawara wanneya‚ eyama mananusayayange kelawara wanneya‚ eyama bhawa raganusayayange kelawara wanneya‚ eyama awijjanusayayange kelawara wanneya.

dedahasa ikmawa dainika aasadithayan thawaduratath wadi wuwahoth sancharana sima dadi kirimata siduwana bawa saukhya sewa adhyaksha janaral waidya asela gunawardhana anathuru angawanawa.me athara, heta aluyama hatharata diwayinatama panawa athi sancharana sima iwath kerena athara, palath athara sancharanaya thawaduratath  thahanam wanu athi.eeye rathri 10 sita diwayinatama balapawathwena paridi sancharana sima panawu athara, heta aluyama sancharana sima iwath kerunada bas ratha ha dumriya dhawanaya thawaduratath  palath thula pamanak sidukarana bawa  prawahana rajya amathya dilum amunugama kiya sitiya.me athara, sancharana simawala prathipala me wanawita wishleshanaya karamin sitina bawa saukhya sewa adhyaksha janaral waidya asela gunawardhana ada pawathi madhya  hamuwakadi sandahan kala.sancharana sima lihil karana lada kalasimawe mathpan mililitara 28,500 ka pramanayak nithiwirodhi lesa prawahanaya kala hokandara - sinhapura pradeshaye padinchi pudgalayeku athadanguwata gena thibenawa.surabadu departhamenthuwa sandahan kale elesa athadanguwata gath  sakakaru sathuwa thibu mathpan thogaye watinakama rupiyal 60,000 ikmawana bawayi.surabadu niladharin sidukarana lada wimarshanawaladi anawarana wi aththe poson pohoya dinaye nithiwirodhi lesa adhika mila gananwalata alewi kirima sandaha mema mathpan miladi gena athi bawatayi.me athara, aanamaduwa pradeshaye wawaka diye gili jiwithakshayata pathwu ayeku korona aasadithayeku bawata thahawuru wima nisa wissakata aasanna pirisak nirodhayanaya sandaha yomukara thibenawa.

ohu pilibanda liya thabanna.naradage naganiyage puthu wana nalendra amarasinha yuwala, naradage pasala wana kaluthara widuhale aadi sisu, mejar jenaral nissanka wijesinha yuwala, moratuwa wels kumari widuhale hitapu niyojya widuhalpathiniyaka wana pushpa malalasekara mahathmiya, me uthsawayedi mata sahaya dun samipathamayan.narada jiwathwa sitina thak mata oone wune ohu sathutin thabanna.
